highlights: Co-led development of Vaka, a greenfield, real-time observability platform that enhanced error resolution in customer-facing online shopping systems, significantly reducing Mean Time to Recovery (MTTR)
Integrated client-side routing with React Router for the Cart SPA, enabling robust A/B testing and smoother user experiences
Developed and optimized online checkout features to reduce load times, improve error messaging, and enhance UI clarity around service selections and product groupings

Mentored 4 new engineers through structured weekly sessions, accelerating onboarding timelines by providing hands-on guidance and technical walkthroughs and authored onboarding templates for React, TypeScript, and Git best practices
Spearheaded a login gateway initiative, coordinating cross-team efforts to introduce A/B tested login flows that improved user authentication rates
Collaborated with internal frontend design team to identify, report, and deliver bugfixes
Founded and led a company-wide DevOps Guild standardizing workflows and training across GCP, Terraform, and GitHub Actions
Resolved a critical security vulnerability in the gift registry flow, safeguarding sensitive customer address information
Created a reusable GCP project repository template using Terraform and Workload Identity Federation for GitHub
Managed monthly on-call shifts for global checkout support, effectively identifying and resolving production issues and managing market rollbacks
Architected and developed Angular components such as a dynamic reporting table, interactive OPC device parameter navigation, and editable data tables with conditional logic
Designed a configurable alert infrastructure integrating SQL stored procedures, Angular dialogs, and web API hooks to automate notifications
Optimized SQL stored procedures, significantly reducing query latency and improving overall response times
Refactored legacy Angular and SQL codebases to eliminate performance bottlenecks and improve maintainability
Developed a NLP chat app with a React/Redux frontend, Django backend integrated with Google DialogFlow
Implemented conversational logic for a healthcare chatbot using Django middleware and DialogFlow intent structures
Optimized data polling and statistics calculations in an Angular-based patient management system
Developed virtual assistant UI components in React, leading to an increase in user engagement and streamlined conversational feature integration

Led and mentored residents in a structured recovery program, fostering accountability, emotional resilience, and teamwork through daily guidance, conflict resolution, and collaborative problem-solving
Modernized legacy financial applications by refactoring outdated architecture and improving code readability and maintainability
Created SQL tools for database optimization, enhancing data integrity and boosting query performance
Collaborated closely with clients to gather requirements and successfully delivered tailored software solutions

projects.name: To-dos
projects.description: Basic todo list application for continued learning purposes, focusing on Tailwind CSS, Next.js App Router, and MinimongoDB
